snippet: As David Beckham prepares to play what he has said will be his last game for the L.A. Galaxy in the M.L.S. Cup on Saturday, his footprints are visible all over soccer in the United States.
abstract: Los Angeles Galaxy midfielder David Beckham, who has helped redefine soccer in the United States, is preparing to play in MLS Cup, what he says will be his last game for the Galaxy; has no plans of retiring, and expects to stay involved with the league as part owner of one of the teams--option stipulated in his contract.
lead_paragraph: As David Beckham prepares to play what he has said will be his last game for the L.A. Galaxy in the M.L.S. Cup on Saturday, his footprints are visible all over soccer in the United States.

headline.seo: David Beckham of Galaxy Ending M.L.S. Career With Title Game
headline.main: Beckham Wrapping Up American Mission With M.L.S.
headline.print_headline: Beckham Wrapping Up American Mission With M.L.S.
